targets.query: SELECT count("clientIP") FROM "request_details" WHERE "proxyName" =~ /^$proxyName$/ AND "responseCode" = '401' AND "keyName" =~ /^$keyName$/ AND "method" =~ /^$httpMethod$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
